bean.p:messageText: Course exam data differs from Catalog.

@{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.alternateCourseCodesSuffixStripped} is a crosslisted alias for: @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.courseOfferingCode}. Changes made on this page to @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.courseOfferingCode} will be applied to all aliases, including @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.alternateCourseCodesSuffixStripped}.
Deleting a delivery format will delete all of its activities and registration groups from the system.
The waitlist settings can be managed on the individual Edit Activity Offering screens.

property.name: promptText
property.value: Waitlists for all Activity Offerings associated with this Course Offering will be deactivated upon update.

bean.p:messageText: You are about to leave this page and any unsaved changes will not be retained?
